attributes.action: Refund Half of international students university fees
attributes.additional_details: We suggest this as , everyone is suffering due to the changes brought in by the pandemic, especially financially. Paying the full fees when we can’t physically access resources / be physically present in campus makes no sense.
attributes.background: As international students who aren’t able to come back to the UK , we are still paying a full fees of £23,500 which seems highly unfair  considering we were told not to come and most of education is online. We demand a reduction for the future academic year and a partial refund for the current year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572202
